name: start

commands_raw:
Marchosias: Yes, I can confirm that.
---
Marchosias: I was on the upper floor, inside my room. 
---
Marchosias: I saw a shadow true the door, calling my name.
---
Marchosias: A female voice knocked on the door saying "room service".
---
Marchosias: It was the cleaning lady for sure I can recognize her name instantly.
---
Dalian: Was this around 8:12 AM when the body was discovered?
---
Machosias: Yes I confirm my statement, this was at the same time.
---
Machosias: You see Nabella is a cleaning maid.
---
Marchosias: She starts cleaning at 7:30, not finishes cleaning at 7:30, and she always start cleaning upper floor first.
---
Marchosias: I know this because I always hear footsteps in the upper floor. Every day...
---
Marchosias: But now that I think about it... there has been a day where I haven't heard them. That was yesterday.
signal(set,dayWithoutFootSteps,true)
-> choices
name: ask about nabella 730
choices

commands_raw:
Marchosias: Long time ago... I fought in a war
---
Marchosias: I fought for georgism.
---
Marchosias: People do not argue with the teaching of George; they simply do not know it. And it is impossible to do otherwise with his teaching, for he who becomes acquainted with it cannot but agree.
?> If it’s so convincing, why didn’t the world change? -> skeptical
?> What was it like? Fighting for land justice? -> curious
name: war

commands_raw:
Ah, but the world rarely moves on truth. It moves on convenience, on fear, on property. George did not oppose these ideas he merely sought fairness.
---
But fairness... fairness does not enrich kings.
-> choices
name: skeptical

commands_raw:
I've met and lost countless of friends, their souls forever haunting me - even to this day.
---
I can still hear their names when I go to sleep, their screams when I wake up and their deaths when I live.
-> choices
name: curious
